languages.text: "Друзианцы не оставляют надежд привести Простор Коронус в лоно веры, а их паства уповает на помощь миссионеров. Каждый ящик с провизией, партия медкомплектов или обмундирования, помеченные вашим гербом — знак того, что сам Вольный Торговец убежден в грядущем успехе этой секты. Главный среди друзианцев — Преподобный Иеронимус, чаще всего его видят в большом атриуме Футфола. Мрачный тип, но иные его почитают едва не за святого".

traits.locale_text: "Друзианцы не оставляют надежд привести Коронус в лоно веры. Каждый ящик с провизией, партия медкомплектов или обмундирования, помеченные вашим гербом — знак того, что сам Вольный Торговец убежден в их успехе. К тому же, они единственные знают, как уберечься от скверны Архиврага. На Футфоле их представляет (Имя), его можно найти в (Локация)".

languages.text: "The Drusians still hope to bring the Koronus Expanse into the warm embrace of the faith, just as their flock hopes to receive the aid of the Drusian missionaries. Each crate of food, shipment of clothes, or box of medicine marked with your seal is a sign the Rogue Trader {mf|himself|herself} believes in the sect's future success. Reverend Hieronymus is the first among the Drusians and is most often seen in Footfall's grand atrium. A gloomy fellow, but some almost believe him to be a saint."
languages.original_text: "Друзианцы не оставляют надежд привести Простор Коронус в лоно веры, а их паства уповает на помощь миссионеров. Каждый ящик с провизией, партия медкомплектов или обмундирования, помеченные вашим гербом — знак того, что сам Вольный Торговец убежден в грядущем успехе этой секты. Главный среди друзианцев — Преподобный Иеронимус, чаще всего его видят в большом атриуме Футфола. Мрачный тип, но иные его почитают едва не за святого".

traits.locale_text: "The Drusians still hope to bring Koronus into the warm embrace of the faith just as their flock hopes to receive the aid from the missionaries. Each crate of food, shipment of clothes or a box of medicine marked with your seal is a sign the Rogue Trader {mf|himself|herself} believes in the sect's future success. Reverend Hieronimus is the first among the Drusians and is most often seen in Footfall's grand atrium. A gloomy fellow, but some almost believe him to be a living saint."

Reverend Hieronimus is the first among the Drusians and is most often seen in Footfall's grand atrium. A gloomy fellow, but some almost believe him to be a living saint."

Each crate of food, shipment of clothes, or box of medicine marked with your seal is a sign the Rogue Trader {mf|himself|herself} believes in the sect's future success. Reverend Hieronymus is the first among the Drusians and is most often seen in Footfall's grand atrium. A gloomy fellow, but some almost believe him to be a saint."

languages.text: “德鲁苏斯的信徒仍然希望能让科罗努斯扩区重归信仰的怀抱之中。信奉他们指引的人们，也同样希望能得到他们的援助。我们给他们的每箱食物、每批衣服与每盒药品上都印有您的徽记，这表明行商浪人{mf|本人|本人}相信这个教派将会蓬勃发展。希罗尼穆斯牧师是德鲁苏斯教派的领袖，常常会在落脚港的中庭出现。他是个阴沉的家伙，但一部分人几乎相信他是位圣人。”
languages.original_text: "The Drusians still hope to bring the Koronus Expanse into the warm embrace of the faith, just as their flock hopes to receive the aid of the Drusian missionaries. Each crate of food, shipment of clothes, or box of medicine marked with your seal is a sign the Rogue Trader {mf|himself|herself} believes in the sect's future success. Reverend Hieronymus is the first among the Drusians and is most often seen in Footfall's grand atrium. A gloomy fellow, but some almost believe him to be a saint."

traits.locale_text: “德鲁苏斯的信徒仍然希望能让科罗努斯星域重归信仰的怀抱之中。信奉他们指引的人们，也同样希望能得到他们的援助。我们给他们的每箱食物、每批衣服与每盒药品上都印有您的徽记，这表明行商浪人{mf|本人|本人}相信这个教派将会蓬勃发展。希罗尼穆斯牧师是德鲁苏斯教派的领袖，常常会在落脚港的中庭出现。他是个阴沉的家伙，但一部分人几乎相信他是位活生生的圣人。”

languages.text: «Los drusianos siguen teniendo esperanza de traer la Extensión de Koronus a la fe, mientras que su rebaño sigue esperando poder recibir la ayuda de los misioneros drusianos. Cada contenedor de comida, cada envío de ropa y cada caja de medicamentos que reciben estampados con su sello es una señal de que {mf|el|la} Comerciante Independiente cree en el futuro éxito de su secta. El reverendo Hieronymus es el líder de los drusianos y se le suele ver en el gran atrio de Paso. Es un hombre triste, pero algunos lo consideran un santo».
languages.original_text: "The Drusians still hope to bring the Koronus Expanse into the warm embrace of the faith, just as their flock hopes to receive the aid of the Drusian missionaries. Each crate of food, shipment of clothes, or box of medicine marked with your seal is a sign the Rogue Trader {mf|himself|herself} believes in the sect's future success. Reverend Hieronymus is the first among the Drusians and is most often seen in Footfall's grand atrium. A gloomy fellow, but some almost believe him to be a saint."

traits.locale_text: «Los drusianos siguen teniendo esperanza de traer la Extensión de Koronus a la fe, mientras que su rebaño sigue esperando poder recibir la ayuda de los misioneros drusianos. Cada contenedor de comida, cada envío de ropa y cada caja de medicamentos que reciben estampados con su sello es una señal de que {mf|el|la} Comerciante Independiente cree en el futuro éxito de su secta. El reverendo Hieronymus es el líder de los drusianos y se le suele ver en el gran atrio de Paso. Es un hombre triste, pero algunos lo consideran un santo en vida».

languages.text: 「ドルシアンは、彼らの群れがドルシアンの伝道者の援助を受けることを望むように、コロヌス・エクスパンスを温かい信仰に包まれることを今も望んでいます。あなた様の印が押された食料の箱、衣服の入った積み荷、薬の箱は、自由開拓者{mf|自身|自身}が派閥の将来の成功を信じている証なのです。リバーエンド・ヒエロニムス司祭はドルシアンの長であり、フットフォールの壮大なアトリウムによく滞在しています。陰気な人物ですが、彼を聖人だと信じている者もいるのです」
languages.original_text: "The Drusians still hope to bring the Koronus Expanse into the warm embrace of the faith, just as their flock hopes to receive the aid of the Drusian missionaries. Each crate of food, shipment of clothes, or box of medicine marked with your seal is a sign the Rogue Trader {mf|himself|herself} believes in the sect's future success. Reverend Hieronymus is the first among the Drusians and is most often seen in Footfall's grand atrium. A gloomy fellow, but some almost believe him to be a saint."

traits.locale_text: 「ドルスス派は、彼らの群れがドルスス派の伝道者の援助を受けることを望むように、コロヌス・エクスパンスを信仰の温かい抱擁の中に引き入れることを今も望んでいます。あなたの印が押された食料の木箱、衣服の出荷、薬の箱は、ローグトレーダーが宗派の将来の成功を信じている証なのです。ヒエロニムス司祭はドルスス派の長であり、フットフォールの壮大なアトリウムでよく見かけられる。陰気な人物ですが、彼を生ける聖人だと信じている者もいるのです」

languages.text: "Die Drusianer hoffen immer noch darauf, die Koronus-Ausdehnung in die warme Umarmung des Glaubens zu bringen, genau wie ihre Herde hofft, Hilfe durch die Drusus-Missionare zu erhalten. Jede Kiste mit Lebensmitteln, jede Kleidungs- oder Arzneilieferung mit Eurem Siegel gilt als Zeichen, dass {mf|der Freihändler|die Freihändlerin} selbst an den zukünftigen Erfolg der Sekte glaubt. Reverend Hieronymus leitet die Drusianer und ist meist im großen Atrium von Footfall zu finden. Ein düsterer Geselle, aber manche halten ihn fast für einen Heiligen."
languages.original_text: "The Drusians still hope to bring the Koronus Expanse into the warm embrace of the faith, just as their flock hopes to receive the aid of the Drusian missionaries. Each crate of food, shipment of clothes, or box of medicine marked with your seal is a sign the Rogue Trader {mf|himself|herself} believes in the sect's future success. Reverend Hieronymus is the first among the Drusians and is most often seen in Footfall's grand atrium. A gloomy fellow, but some almost believe him to be a saint."

traits.locale_text: "Die Drusianer hoffen immer noch darauf, die Koronus-Ausdehnung in die warme Umarmung des Glaubens zu bringen, genau wie ihre Herde hofft, Hilfe durch die Drusus-Missionare zu erhalten. Jede Kiste mit Lebensmitteln, jede Kleidungs- oder Arzneilieferung mit Eurem Siegel gilt als Zeichen, dass {mf|der Freihändler|die Freihändlerin} selbst an den zukünftigen Erfolg der Sekte glaubt. Reverend Hieronymus leitet die Drusianer und ist meist im großen Atrium von Footfall zu finden. Ein düsterer Geselle, aber manche halten ihn fast für so was wie einen lebenden Heiligen."

languages.text: « Les Drusiens espèrent toujours convertir les Étendues de Koronus à leur foi, tout comme leurs ouailles espèrent recevoir l'aide de leurs missionnaires. Chaque caisse de nourriture, chaque cargaison de vêtements ou chaque livraison de médicaments marquée de votre sceau est un signe que {mf|le libre-marchand|la libre-marchande} en personne croit dans l'avenir de la secte. Le révérend Hiéronymus est le premier d'entre eux, et il n'est pas rare de le croiser dans le grand atrium de Castel. C'est un individu lugubre, mais certains ne sont pas loin de le considérer comme un saint. »
languages.original_text: "The Drusians still hope to bring the Koronus Expanse into the warm embrace of the faith, just as their flock hopes to receive the aid of the Drusian missionaries. Each crate of food, shipment of clothes, or box of medicine marked with your seal is a sign the Rogue Trader {mf|himself|herself} believes in the sect's future success. Reverend Hieronymus is the first among the Drusians and is most often seen in Footfall's grand atrium. A gloomy fellow, but some almost believe him to be a saint."

traits.locale_text: « Les Drusiens espèrent toujours convertir les Étendues de Koronus à leur foi, tout comme leurs ouailles espèrent recevoir l'aide de leurs missionnaires. Chaque caisse de nourriture, chaque cargaison de vêtements ou chaque livraison de médicaments marquée de votre sceau est un signe que {mf|le libre-marchand|la libre-marchande} en personne croit dans l'avenir de la secte. Le révérend Hiéronymus est le premier d'entre eux, et il n'est pas rare de le croiser dans le grand atrium de Castel. C'est un individu lugubre, mais certains ne sont pas loin de le considérer comme un saint. »

languages.text: "Drususçular, tüm Koronus Enginliği'ni inançlarının sıcak çemberiyle sarmak istiyor. Tıpkı Drusus misyonerlerinden yardım görmeyi umdukları gibi. Mührünüzü taşıyan her yiyecek kasası, giysi sevkiyatı ve ilaç kutusu; bizzat Hür Tacir'in, tarikatın gelecekte başarılı olacağına inandığının bir göstergesi. Muhterem Hieronymus, Drususçuların başıdır ve genellikle Binliman'ın büyük atriyumunda vakit geçirir. Kasvetli bir adam olsa da bazıların gözünde âdeta bir azizdir."
languages.original_text: "The Drusians still hope to bring the Koronus Expanse into the warm embrace of the faith, just as their flock hopes to receive the aid of the Drusian missionaries. Each crate of food, shipment of clothes, or box of medicine marked with your seal is a sign the Rogue Trader {mf|himself|herself} believes in the sect's future success. Reverend Hieronymus is the first among the Drusians and is most often seen in Footfall's grand atrium. A gloomy fellow, but some almost believe him to be a saint."

traits.locale_text: "Drususçular, tüm Koronus Enginliği'ni inançlarının sıcak çemberiyle sarmak istiyor. Tıpkı Drusus misyonerlerinden yardım görmeyi umdukları gibi. Mührünüzü taşıyan her yiyecek kasası, giysi sevkiyatı ve ilaç kutusu; bizzat Hür Tacir'in, tarikatın gelecekte başarılı olacağına inandığının bir göstergesi. Muhterem Hieronymus, Drususçuların başıdır ve genellikle Binliman'ın büyük atriyumunda vakit geçirir. Kasvetli bir adam olsa da bazıların gözünde âdeta bir azizdir."
